description: Main source file of a Flutter application for an online bookstore front-end. It contains app initialization, theme setup, widget definitions, mock data repositories, and page implementations such as Home, Catalog, Cart, Profile, and checkout flows.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Contains static color constants and gradients used throughout the app.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: Model representing a book item with attributes like id, title, author, category, coverUrl, etc.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Model representing an item in the shopping cart with associated Book and quantity.

classes.name: MockBookRepository
classes.description: Provides mock data fetching methods for categories, featured books, search, and retrieval by ID.

classes.name: CatalogState
classes.description: State management for search, filter, and sort of book catalog.

classes.name: CartState
classes.description: State management for cart items, including add, remove, decrement, clear functions.

classes.name: UserState
classes.description: Mock user profile data with update capability.

classes.name: BookStoreApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter app, setting up providers and theme.

classes.name: RootNav
classes.description: Bottom navigation widget managing main screens: Home, Shop, Cart, Profile.

classes.name: GradientHeader
classes.description: Reusable header with gradient background used on multiple pages.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Displays featured books and an entry hero section.

classes.name: CatalogPage
classes.description: Main page for browsing, searching, filtering, and sorting books.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: Displays a book's cover, title, author, rating, and price in grid or list.

classes.name: BookDetailPage
classes.description: Displays a detailed view of a specific book, with option to add to cart.

classes.name: CartPage
classes.description: Shows items in the cart, allows quantity adjustments, and proceeds to checkout.

classes.name: CheckoutPage
classes.description: Mock checkout form with shipping and payment options, final order review.

classes.name: ProfilePage
classes.description: Displays user profile info with options to update profile and sign out.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point. Sets up test mode flag and runs the BookStoreApp.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the app's Material UI theme with custom colors and styles.

methods.name: _initTestModeFlag
methods.description: Initializes a runtime flag to indicate if app is running in test/debug mode.
